participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Expressive and often impulsive, Alex tends to voice their thoughts without a filter.
participant_1.background: Alex grew up in a fast-paced urban environment, contributing to their straightforward and sometimes abrasive communication style.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Calm and collected, Jordan usually approaches conversations with a level-headed attitude.
participant_2.background: Having a background in psychology, Jordan often tries to understand the emotions behind others' words.
